channel.title: Stronghold 3!
channel.description:
Hey guys guess what game is currently in production? You guessed it Stronghold 3 do you guys think it will be worth the wait or will it just be a major letdown like last time? All I know is I'm not getting my hopes up, Stronghold Crusader was the last good Stronghold game for me :meh: Who knows though this game could be the game to reboot the series.
[img]https://www.stronghold3.com/images/screenshots/05.jpg[/img]

item.title: Stronghold 3!
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
coldroll:

On Wikipedia they also said they might make smaller animals launchble as well.
SURPLUS_NiNjA you have to agree that Stronghold 2 was pretty boring.

It was decent. But that’s the point I was trying to make, I am just saying that I don’t think Stronghold deserves the reputation of a good game that just got so fucked up that you can’t even trust the 3rd. I look forward to the next game and am confident that it will be a pretty good game, even if it turns out not to be worth full retail price.

Read full topic

item.title: Stronghold 3!
item.dc:creator: Imonfire
item.description:
I’m a massive fan of Stronghold since the first one came out. Crusader had always being my favorite, and Crusader: Extreme just made it even more fun. Stronghold 2, IMO, wasn’t all that bad. Sure, it was a massive slap in the face after how awesome the previous ones were, but still, it was decent.

I really hope this one will turn out good.

Read full topic

item.title: Stronghold 3!
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
Wait, lets see. There has been 2 good games, Stronghold and Stronghold: Crusader but because of 1 failure Stronghold 2 you feel the series needs a reboot?

Edit: Oh wait I checked wikipedia and there where two side things, that I never paid attention to.

Read full topic

item.title: Stronghold 3!
item.dc:creator: Hazzmat
item.description:
They knew that Stronghold 2 sucked so gamplay is going to be similar to 1 except better I hope oh and I hope there will be more variation in landscap instead of ONLY desert in crusader and only forest in the original one.
